name: Idle Airport
description:
Ready to become the worlds richest Airport owner?

Expand your Airport franchise around the globe while you sit back and rack in the cash!

Grow from a small Airport to a International one! Offer the most luxurious planes, shops, lounges, and experiences. Invest into your Airlines to increase your profit and make them world renowned! Keep your Airport moving or ruin your customers vacation and wreck your reputation. Keep your seatbelt on because we're about to take flight!
